a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: GDP price levels relative to the US, 1990 to 2022
The 'price level ratio of PPP conversion factors to market exchange rates' measures differences in price levels
relative to the US. A value below 1 means that a given sum of US dollars purchases more goods and services
Data source: Multiple sources compiled by World Bank (2024)
